skillTree.name: Terrorgheist (Mount)
skillTree.description: Enables the Terrorgheist Mount

skillTree.name: Death from the Deeps
skillTree.description: When a Mourngul Lord gathers his fleet, the hideous and stinking corpses of the most feared creatures of the sea swim along their ships

effects.description:
Leadership +4% for all Monster units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership +8% for all Monster units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Grave Ward
skillTree.description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: The Carrion Fleets
skillTree.description: The mere vision of the ragged sails and worn ships of a Mourngul Lord´s fleet on the horizon is more than enough for entire cities to fall into a blind state of panic

effects.description:
Income from all enemy buildings: -5%
	(local enemy province)

skillTree.name: Insatiable
skillTree.description: The thirst of this vampire is unquencheable and he will never stop pursuing his prey

skillTree.name: Creatures of the Night
skillTree.description: On land and sea, Strigoi will attract and give unlife and strength to the most reviled creatures of the world, those that devour the flesh of mortals until they themselves are corrupted by Dark Magic

effects.description:
Weapon Strength: +4% for Mournguls units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +8% for Mournguls units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Apex Predator
skillTree.description: Other Vampire Captains search corpses of the greatest see monsters to reanimate and use them. An Strigoi hunts the living ones and kills them himself

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +2 for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Dark Knight
skillTree.description: "See my coat of crimson armour? It is strengthened by thine blood and fear."

skillTree.name: Beguile
skillTree.description: "Look into mine eyes, mortal; what glories do you see?"

skillTree.name: Quickblood
skillTree.description: The sword-strikes of mortal man are but clumsy, childish lunges before the preternatural speed of a Vampire.

skillTree.name: Master Strike
skillTree.description: Strike hard, strike true.

skillTree.name: Curse of the Revenant
skillTree.description: The strength of this Vampire to endure the centuries is beyond compare.

skillTree.name: Supernatural Horror
skillTree.description: To look upon this Undead Lord is to witness true and absolute horror!

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Martial Mastery (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Defensive Dedication (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

ui_effects.description: Greatly replenishes hit points of combatants

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Vanhel's Danse Macabre"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Vanhel's Danse Macabre Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Vanhel's Danse Macabre Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target

Summons a unit of Zombie Pirate Deckhands Mob

effects.description: Spell number of uses: +1 for "Drowned Dead"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Drowned Dead Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Diviner
skillTree.description: This adept uses the Winds of Magic to seek out arcane artefacts.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Held Together by Screws
skillTree.description: Bone, muscle and sinew cannot always be relied upon to hold together unassisted.

skillTree.name: Reanimated Marksman
skillTree.description: Death hasn't got in the way of this one's sure-shotted aim; in fact, if anything, he's got better.

skillTree.name: Black Powder Overload
skillTree.description: You can't have too much of a good thing and a bit of what you fancy does no harm.

skillTree.name: Rotten Death
skillTree.description: It never ends well.

skillTree.name: Haunting Horror
skillTree.description: What has been seen cannot be unseen.

skillTree.name: Drowned & Bound
skillTree.description: Like Unliving moths drawn inexorably towards a dazzling flame, the risen drowned strive - and stumble - to always be close to the one who has bound them.

skillTree.name: Avast Ye!
skillTree.description: "Listen very carefully, me hearties, I shall say this only once… Quiet! Stromfels' stinkin' breath!"

skillTree.name: Deadly March
skillTree.description: The once-men of the Undead legions march ever onwards, according to the will of their binder.

Armour: +18 for Zombie Pirate Deckhands Mob and Depth Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ensorcelled Weapons
skillTree.description: This is a dirty business, that much is certain, so why not get a little extra help to give yourself an edge?

Armour: +12 for for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob, Rotting Prometheans Gunnery Mob, Deck Gunners, Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Masterly Splicing
skillTree.description: Their rope skills are really rather excellent, considering how long the entire crew have been dead.

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hardened by Death
skillTree.description: Surviving death tends to instil a certain toughness in one.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +8 for Rotting Prometheans, Rotting Leviathan and Necrofex Colossus units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: All Hands Hoay!
skillTree.description: "Now listen up an' listen good… here be the plan…"

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Binded to Service
skillTree.description: They could not break free, even if they wanted to.

skillTree.name: Ghost Fleet
skillTree.description: Cursed to haunt the waves forever, never finding rest or solace.

skillTree.name: Freebooter
skillTree.description: If it's not tacked down, this one'll 'ave it and kill anyone who gets in their way.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%

skillTree.name: Sea Dogs
skillTree.description: "You'll never find such a crew - villainous scum, the lot of 'em. I certainly wouldn't want to be facing 'em in the thick of battle!"

effects.description:
Leadership: +2 when fighting at sea
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +4 when fighting at sea
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 when fighting at sea
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Go on Account
skillTree.description: There's a time in every sailor's, er, life when the black flag seems like the best, if not the only option.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Guile & Glamour
skillTree.description: A simple glamour can disguise a monstrous Vampire or Liche, so they may then charm and beguile the local populace.

skillTree.name: Gambler's Wit
skillTree.description: Such things keep the eternal players' of this world alive.

skillTree.name: Coaming & Preservative
skillTree.description: Take care of your ship and she will have a care for your wellbeing in return.

skillTree.name: Black Flag
skillTree.description: Beware those who sail under the black flag - they give no quarter and never, ever give up the chase.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Firestarter
backgroundSkills.description: Beautiful and innocent it may be, but all will be consumed by fire in the end. It is written.

effects.description: Gain loyalty from razing settlements and winning siege battles
Brute: Extra loyalty gained following a battle

Attrition: +10% when under siege
	(enemy armies in local region)

backgroundSkills.name: Plunderer
backgroundSkills.description: How else is an ordinary, decent pirate to make an honest living in these hard, dark times?

effects.description: Gain loyalty from sacking and raiding
Brute: Extra loyalty gained following a battle

backgroundSkills.name: Murderer
backgroundSkills.description: Killing is at the forefront of this one's mind. Hopefully, they also know how to run a ship.

effects.description: Gain loyalty from defeating enemy army and wounding/killing enemy Lords in battle
Brute: Extra loyalty gained following a battle

backgroundSkills.name: Instigator
backgroundSkills.description: It takes more than mere muscle to be leader, you must also know how to make money and how to inflict pain - a lot of pain.

effects.description: Gain loyalty from recruiting and fighting with other pirate Lords in battle
Mastermind: Loyalty decline rate is lowered

backgroundSkills.name: Intrigant
backgroundSkills.description: There's nothing quite like a good, straightforward plan - and this is nothing like one! Complexity rarely trumps simplicity, in all matters.

effects.description: Gain loyalty from ambush and lightning-strike battles
Mastermind: Loyalty decline rate is lowered

backgroundSkills.name: Smuggler
backgroundSkills.description: Be the cargo powder, steel, gold or flesh, in the final analysis it matters not.

effects.description: Gain loyalty from constructing pirate coves
Mastermind: Loyalty decline rate is lowered
